pages.text: $(li)The gluey Snail Slime can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:utility/autumnity/snail_slime_block)Snail Slime Block$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/slimeball)Slimeballs$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/autumnity/extension)Potion of Extension$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/autumnity/snail)Snails$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
